message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $14000. This is a limited-time offer, and I believe it presents an excellent value considering its worth to you is $12000. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or finalizing the purchase.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but based on my assessment, I am only willing to pay up to $12000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
